name: Battle of Dry Lake 24
summary:
Mechanic Single-player FPS Game
" Become a mercenary and fight in 24-hour battle. "
- Strengthen your battle suit and weapons. As time progresses, more powerful enemies will appear.
- Easily destroy enemies with reloadable advanced weapons.

● Indie game developed by one person.
● Small size game. (No need for additional bundles)
● Compete with your Facebook friends. (For higher difficulty option, you can get more bonus scores)
● Use headphones for better gameplay.

- GAME PLAY: https://youtu.be/1_FKq5kc8t4
- GAME CONTROLS : https://youtu.be/fPmGwW2LhiQ
- FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/KJJ.Maverick
